## Top searches for political topics

### Import & Clean Dataset

```{r}
# Reading in Google search topics dataset from Nov 04
district_searches = read_csv(file =  "./data/Search_Data_US_Congressional_District_04Nov2018.csv")

# Filtering states to Texas 
tx_data = 
  district_searches %>% janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  filter(state == "TX")
```

```{r}
tx_data %>% 
  group_by(state)
  summarize(unique_first = n_distinct(first))
```
